name: kneel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 to go down into, or stay in, a position where one or both knees are on the ground: She knelt (down) beside the child. He knelt in front of the altar and prayed.

Add to word list
Add to word list
to go down into, or stay in, a position where one or both knees are on the ground: She knelt down to look under the bed for her doll. Gibbons kneeled next to the plant and started digging.
